title: Episode 305: Albert Fish Part 4
description:
The end is here! Alaina’s psyche shall repair over the course of the next week and so will yours. The final installment of this series will cover Albert’s trial and ultimately his own death. See you later this week with some light Listener Tales!

Deranged by Harold Shechter
Confessions of a Cannibal by Robert Keller

As always, thank you to our sponsors:
